title: The Odds Are Murder
description: Swain wasn't betting on his future. He'd returned home, wasted and flat broke, to find the city ravaged by a deadly plague. But when an old friend got fried before his eyes, Swain was back in business. The stakes were life and death for millions, including Swain's long-lost love. Odds were he'd die catching the murderer--if the plague didn't kill him first!
author: Mike McQuay
